parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have in full, be far, it is enough. From apo and echo; to have out, i.e. Receive in full; to keep away, i.e. Be distant.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
Visible form, shape, appearance, outward show, kind, species, class. From eido; a view, i.e. Form.
